Entries.Introduction: I guess it's neat to have a human around.$0#$b#Just don't do any bad human things.$5
Entries.Mon: I think I have the best house in the neighborhood.$0#$b#Don't tell the others I said that.$3
Entries.Tue: I'm glad this island doesn't have a volcano.$0#$b#I have a lot of nightmares about those things erupting.$3
Entries.Wed: I think this village could really use a yoga center.$3#$b#Wouldn't that be great?$0
Entries.Fri: I need a new hobby.$3#$b#Got any ideas?$3
Entries.Sat: I would try swimming...$3#$b#But I'm afraid.$2
Entries.Sun: I like the squirrels that pop up every now and again.$0#$b#They're so cute!$1
